title: Unable to access League of Legends login queue
body:
I have so far spent the last two days troubleshooting this problem.

I recently installed League of Legends on a new computer, the installer functioned fine, the launcher works perfectly, but when I type in my credentials (which are completely up-to-date) I get the following message:

>Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). If it looks good, follow the guide [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201761944).

I've checked the server status to see it was completely working, I've made sure my internet was running at full bars, I've adjusted firewall settings to allow League of Legends, used every troubleshooting option possible on the support articles presented in the second link, right-clicked the icon to run as administrator, gave full permissions for anything remotely pertaining to League of Legends in my antivirus program, temporarily uninstalled my internet accountability program, I even tried using the legacy client to no avail.

No option seems to be working and I would greatly appreciate some help. Thanks.

replies.body: Me and another friend on EUW are having the same problem, just unable to connect to the login queue however 4AM last night connection was fine and we were connected with no issues
Same here. What's wrong? =(
EUW & EUNE are currently experiencing login issues. This is being looked into.
EUW & EUNE are currently experiencing login issues. This is being looked into.

You just have to go to "settings" and press "Initiate Full Repair". After LoL is checked for any Errors it restarts and you can Login.

Pls hire me Rito {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I've already tried that.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I also had the error: "LoL new Client unable to connect to the login queue". Even though i thought i did everything good and it was a Riot server issue it wasnt.
Allready tried all Riot's solutions and they did'n work. After some debugging i did finaly resolved the problem myself..

The problem was with a configuration setting in the Esset Security Software. And it was a setting that did'n deactivate even while u fully disable the software (like temp. disable firewall).

In the Esset software you can enable Protocol Protection in the Advanced Settings menu. From then on the software starts controlling all SSL and TLS configuration's and every certificate that comes with it.

I came to this while reading the Log: 2017-05-21T13-09-01_1968_LeagueClient.log
I has the following line:
000012.699| ERROR| lol-login| ALE-4C0F8C92 - FAILED_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_LOGIN_QUEUE - Plugin "rcp-be-lol-login" couldn't talk to "https://lqak.euw1.lol.riotgames.com/login-queue/rest/queues/lol/authenticate" because: 60 - "Peer certificate cannot be authenticated with given CA certificates".

This got me thinking that i let Certificates be mastered by the Esset Security software and not by Microsoft. And thus i started searching in the menu and found that i could deactivate that option. It's called Protocol Filtering and SSL/TLS-Protocol Filtering. Once i deactivated both of these settings. The issue was gone.

So this got me thinking, because at some point this did work. Even with the new client. Did something in security changed on the client? Remember the old client did work, new did 2 but after a certain change it didn. So i think Riot's higher level of security also needs attention in 3rd Security Software. 

Hope this resolution can also help others with same kinda problems.
I don't have Esset so I don't think that's the problem.
riot your update is really stupid its not our internet problems its your damm update been playing for years with the same connection please fix your issue I cant login in either
Well, for some reason, my laptop experiences these problems, but my dad's computer runs League just fine on the same network.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
i have the same problem :(
EUW & EUNE are currently experiencing login issues. This is being looked into.

Your network seems like it's having a hard time getting connected to the login server, which we should be able to fix with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If that doesn't seem to help at all, hit me back up and we may need to dig a little deeper to find the main issue.

It took hours but I did absolutely everything listed there.

And the problem still occurs.

Well, what do you say we do?

Your best bet at this point would be to have our tech guys work with you one on one to get this sorted out. They can take a much closer look at your system then I can here on the boards, so shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help much more there!
